pr_title: Issue #1215 - improved JSON parser error handling / messages

timeline.message:
Issue #1215 - improved JSON parser error handling / messages

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

Issue #1215 - fixed condition for primitive extension edge case

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

Issue #1215 - generated parser updates

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: a lot of ":" used in the message, maybe better to either separate with "," e.g, element: xxx, expected: xxxx, found: xxxx. or maybe use () or ' '.
timeline.author: albertwang-ibm

replies.bodyText: This is consistent with the other error messages for the parser. If I changed this, I'd have to change them all. Maybe a future endeavor.
replies.author: JohnTimm
